metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000069 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: FreePlane version 1.5.9 and earlier contains a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in XML Parser in mindmap loader that can result in stealing data from victim's machine. This attack appears to require the victim to open a specially crafted mind map file. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 1.6+.

criterions.comment: freeplane package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.6-1').
